active.name: Charm
active.description:
Cooldown: 18 seconds

Charms an enemy to fight for you for 8 seconds.
active.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 18 seconds

Temporarily Charms an enemy to fight for you.

active.name: Forceful Push
active.description:
Cooldown: 5 seconds

Summon an Arcane explosion 8 yards around an enemy, dealing 410% weapon damage as Arcane and knocking back all monsters caught within it.
active.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 5 seconds

Creates an explosion that deals massive damage and knocks back enemies.

active.name: Missile Ward
active.description: Buffs you and the Enchantress, reducing damage from ranged attacks by 6%.
active.simpleDescription: Reduces damage from ranged attacks for you and the Enchantress.

active.name: Powered Armor
active.description: Buffs you and the Enchantress, increasing Armor by 3% and slowing melee attackers by 60% for 1 seconds.
active.simpleDescription: Increases Armor and slows melee attackers for you and the Enchantress.

active.name: Disorient
active.description:
Cooldown: 6 seconds

Cast a flash of light in an area, causing enemies to be disoriented for 2 seconds.
active.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 6 seconds

Disorients enemies for a short time.

active.name: Erosion
active.description:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Conjures a pool of energy that deals 330% weapon damage as Arcane over 5 seconds. Affected enemies will also take 3% increased damage.
active.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Conjures a pool of energy that deals damage and causes affected enemies to take additional damage.

active.name: Focused Mind
active.description: A 40 yard aura that increases attack speed for you and the Enchantress by 3%.
active.simpleDescription: An aura that increases attack speed for you and the Enchantress.

active.name: Mass Control
active.description:
Cooldown: 18 seconds

Lob a bulb of magical energy that hexes enemies in an area into chickens for 5 seconds.
active.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 18 seconds

Hexes a nearby group of enemies.
